value:
$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|Umm... Hmm... Oh! This way!
Ótr went this way!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Are you sure, Princess Reginn?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Definitely! If we just follow where
my compass points, we'll be able
to intercept my brother!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Oh, wow! Is that another example
of Niðavellir's seiðjárn?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|Fáfnir made it for me when I was
young—so I wouldn't get lost.$k$pNot that I get lost all the time,
but I always carry it with me...
Like a protection charm!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Not all the time, huh... Well, it sure
is helpful now, at least.$k$pSeiðjárn certainly makes life easier
sometimes. It's a shame it can be
twisted and used for unjust causes...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_エルク,ch03_32_Elk_M_Normal,Face|Lord Pent, Lady Louise... I will repay
my debt to you one day.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|Ah! I recognize this place...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Is there something significant
about it?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|Well, a long time ago, my brothers
and I lived together in a small house
in a nearby village.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Oh, really? So this is something
of a homecoming then!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|In those days, Fáfnir was still just
a regular soldier...$k$pBut even then he would talk about
how he would someday be king and
take us to live in a castle.$k$p$EFace_Smile|When he actually did just that,
I could hardly believe it!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|I've been wondering... Fáfnir excels
at battle, but does he come from
a noble family?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|He always said he doesn't remember.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Huh? How could that be?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|I can't say I understand it myself.
He told us he just...woke up on a
battlefield one day.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|I see... Perhaps he was dealt a blow
during battle and lost his memory
as a result.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|But he's king now, right? Even being
known across the realm, no one came
forward and claimed him as family?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|Ótr worried that would happen...
He thought if something like that
happened, Fáfnir would leave us.$k$pThe two of us cried at the thought.$k$p$EFace_Smile|But Fáfnir just smiled and
comforted us...$k$pHe told us that we were his family
no matter what happened, and he
promised to stay with us forever.$k$p$EFace|But no one ever showed up claiming
to know him.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...The more I learn about Fáfnir, the
harder it is for me to believe he is
the same person we just met.$k$pI just get more and more curious.
Who is he really?$k$p$Sbs150|
